results.question: Within how many days of the original purchase are refunds available?
results.actualAnswer: Refunds are available within 14 days of the original purchase [c:chunk_1 -> Refunds and Billing].

results.question: Under what condition are refunds possible besides being within the 14-day window?
results.expectedAnswer: Only if no boards were created and proof of payment is provided.
results.actualAnswer: Based on the policy excerpts, besides being within the 14-day window, refunds are possible under these additional conditions: 1. No activity requirement: The account must have absolutely no boards created - meaning zero activity on the account [c:chunk_1 -> Refunds and Billing]. 2. Proof of payment: Customers must provide documentation showing proof of payment, such as a receipt [c:chunk_1 -> Refunds and Billing]. 3. No account renewal: The account must not have already renewed, as no refunds are available once renewal has occurred [c:chunk_2 -> Refunds and Billing]. There is also a special case mentioned where refunds for team plans or bulk license purchases might be handled individually on a case by case basis, and customers should contact finance@monday.fake for these situations [c:chunk_2 -> Refunds and Billing]. All of these conditions must be met in addition to the 14-day time requirement for a refund to be possible.

results.question: Are refunds offered if the account has already renewed?
results.expectedAnswer: No refunds are available after renewal.
results.actualAnswer: No, refunds are not offered if the account has already renewed [c:chunk_1 -> Refunds and Billing]. This policy applies consistently across different account types, with one exception: team plans or bulk license purchases may be handled on a case by case basis [c:chunk_3 -> Refunds and Billing]. For team plan refund requests after renewal, customers should contact finance@monday.fake [c:chunk_6 -> Refunds and Billing].

results.question: How are refunds for team plans handled?
results.expectedAnswer: On a case-by-case basis by contacting finance@monday.fake.
results.actualAnswer: Based on the policy document, refunds for team plans (also referred to as bulk license purchases) are handled on a case by case basis [c:chunk_1 -> Refunds]. This means each request is evaluated individually rather than following standard refund criteria. For team plan refund requests, customers should contact finance@monday.fake [c:chunk_3 -> Refunds]. The policy indicates that team plans may be handled differently from regular individual plans, with decisions made based on the specific circumstances of each case [c:chunk_7 -> Refunds].

results.question: What happens when a customer cancels their subscription mid-cycle?
results.expectedAnswer: Billing continues until the renewal date, and then stops. No refund is issued for unused time.
results.actualAnswer: When a customer cancels their subscription mid-cycle, several things happen: The cancellation does not take effect immediately. Instead, billing continues for the remainder of the current cycle until the next renewal date, at which point the billing stops [c:chunk_6 -> Subscriptions and Cancellations]. Customers will not receive any money back for the current billing period they're in when they cancel [c:chunk_2 -> Subscriptions and Cancellations]. The policy specifically states that no refunds are provided for any unused portion of time remaining in the current cycle [c:chunk_9 -> Subscriptions and Cancellations]. The cancellation only prevents future billing by stopping the automatic renewal at the next scheduled renewal date [c:chunk_3 -> Subscriptions and Cancellations].

results.question: How often must passwords be changed?
results.actualAnswer: Based on the policy document, passwords must be changed every 90 days [c:chunk_1 -> Passwords and Security].

results.question: What is the official support email address?
results.actualAnswer: The official support email address is support@monday.fake [c:chunk_1 -> Support Information].

results.question: What happens if support does not reply within 48 hours?
results.actualAnswer: If support does not reply within 48 hours, the request is automatically escalated [c:chunk_1 -> Support Information].

results.question: What are the official customer service hours listed in the document?
results.actualAnswer: The official customer service hours are 09:00–18:00 UTC [c:chunk_1 -> Support Information]. The document also notes that older documents may show different hours of 08:00–17:00, but those are outdated [c:chunk_1 -> Support Information].

results.question: What happens if a customer issues a chargeback?
results.expectedAnswer: Their account is banned immediately and permanently, with no appeal.
results.actualAnswer: When a customer issues a chargeback with their bank or credit card provider, their account gets banned right away and this ban is permanent [c:chunk_1 -> chargeback policy]. There is no way to appeal this type of ban [c:chunk_1 -> chargeback policy]. The policy treats chargebacks very seriously, with immediate and irreversible consequences for the customer's account access.

results.question: Does monday.com provide physical shipping of boxes or hardware?
results.expectedAnswer: No, shipping is not offered at all.
results.actualAnswer: No, monday.com does not provide physical shipping of boxes or hardware. The company operates as a digital-only product, which means shipping is not offered at all [c:chunk_1 -> shipping policy]. There are no physical boxes or hardware components involved in their service [c:chunk_1 -> shipping policy].

results.question: Does monday.com enforce two-factor authentication (2FA) for all users?
results.expectedAnswer: No, it is recommended but not enforced.
results.actualAnswer: No, monday.com does not enforce two-factor authentication (2FA) for all users. While 2FA is recommended by the company, it is not mandatory or enforced [c:chunk_1 -> Passwords and Security].

results.question: Does the monday.com policy document mention anything about data retention or how long customer data is stored?
results.expectedAnswer: No data about it in the text.
results.actualAnswer: I could not find this in the policy. The provided excerpts do not contain any information about data retention or how long customer data is stored.

results.question: Are there any details in the policy draft about integrations with third-party applications or APIs?
results.expectedAnswer: No data about it in the text.
results.actualAnswer: I could not find this in the policy. The provided policy excerpts do not contain any information about integrations with third-party applications or APIs.

results.question: Who is the CEO of Monday.com?
results.expectedAnswer: No data about it in the text.
results.actualAnswer: I could not find this in the policy. The provided excerpts do not contain any information about who the CEO of Monday.com is.
